RACE.RACE_TEXT: RACE 1 1M All Weather Track CR: 75. Claiming Purse 17000. (PLUS UP TO 30% PABF) FOR FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD OR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 28 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Pri ce $12,500 (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances) (Limited To10 Starters).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BABY DRAGON well placed and outside, gained position on the two path through the second turn, bid outside the leader, gaining a short lead into the stretch, then dueled with LADY YELLEN in upper stretch and prevailed. LADY YELLEN allowed to settle, moved up on the two path through the second turn, bid three wide into the stretch, dueled with the winner late and lacked the needed kick. SIGN AND SEAL tracked the pace, saved ground through the turns, was blocked into the stretch, angled out and came through on the two path, then angled further out and had a mild late gain. LA PANDA mid pack, looped up three wide through the second turn, came four wide into the stretch, had a mild gain and held a share. PRETTY FLATTERING ran evenly, inside. LEAD PERFORMER sprinted to a clear lead soon after the start and faded into the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Pretty Flattering
ENTRY.OWNER: Rose Gail M and Rose Earl A
ENTRY.COMMENT: ran evenly, insid

ENTRY.NAME: Lead Performer
ENTRY.OWNER: Dare To Dream Stable LLC (Michael Faber)
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clr, faded into str

ENTRY.NAME: Sign and Seal
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked,blocked into str,came thru,angled out,mild gain

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Yellen
ENTRY.COMMENT: allwd to settle,moved up 2path 2nd,bid 3w str,dueled,no kick

ENTRY.NAME: La Panda
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pck,looped up 3w 2nd, 4w str, mild gain,held share

ENTRY.NAME: Baby Dragon
ENTRY.COMMENT: well plcd,2path2nd,bid outside,led into str,dueled late,prevailed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RACE 2 6 1/2F All Weather Track CR: 72. Claiming Purse 13000. (PLUS UP TO 30% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 28 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250 (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances).

CLAIM.OWNER: S Matthew Kintz Racing and Sales Inc and Fisher James

RACE.FOOTNOTES: ANA L allowed to settle, looped up three and four wide through the turn, fanned five wide into the stretch, made a steady gain, edged ahead and held. ORGANZA unhurried, moved up two and three wide through the turn, came four wide into the stretch, then closed well late, but lacked the needed kick for the win. UPTOWN CHARLOTTE mid pack, saved ground through the turn, came through inside of rivals into the stretch, angled out in mid stretch for racing room and flattened out. FAMILY BAND sprinted to a clear lead soon after the start, turned back a bid and shook clear into the stretch, then weakened late and held a share. ITALIAN TWIN rated off the rail bearing out, moved up two and three wide through the turn, drifted out into the stretch widest, and evened out. WREAKING HAVOC well placed and outside, gained a striking position three wide through the turn, bid on that path into the stretch, then steadied and weakened in the late going. SGT RECKLESS USMC led in the early going, was rated outside, gained a striking position and bid outside the leader into the stretch, then had no rally.

ENTRY.NAME: Ana L
ENTRY.COMMENT: allwd to settle, looped up 3& 4w trn, 5w str, stdy gain,edged

ENTRY.NAME: Organza
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried,moved up 2& 3w trn, 4w str, clsd well late,no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Italian Twin
ENTRY.OWNER: Martin Brothers Racing Stables Inc and Mine to Equine LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated off rail, moved up 2& 3w, drifted out into str,widest, even

ENTRY.NAME: Uptown Charlotte
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pck, svd grnd,came thru, angled out, flattnd out

ENTRY.NAME: Family Band
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC and Evertz William
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clr, stayed on, shook clear, wknd late, held share

ENTRY.NAME: Wreaking Havoc
ENTRY.OWNER: Martin Brothers Racing Stables Inc and The Unstable LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: well plcd outside, striking position 3w trn, 3w str, stdy,wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Sgt Reckless USMC
ENTRY.COMMENT: led early, rated outside, striking position 2path trn, no rally

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RACE 3 6F All Weather Track CR: 90. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 24000. (PLUS UP TO 30% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $16,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $25,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 28 Allowed 2 lbs. Claimin g Price $25,000 (Claiming Races For $20,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THE SINNER IS YOU mid pack, saved ground through the turn, got through inside the leader into the stretch, then made a steady gain and drove clear late. TWIRLING MAMBA rated close up, gained position on the two path through the turn, fanned four wide into the stretch and closed well for the place. CALL ME LATER set the pace on the inside, stayed on when challenged into the stretch, then weakened late and held the show. GRAINGER COUNTY allowed to settle, saved ground on the two path through the turn, came through on that path into the stretch and flattened out. SUPREMACY stalked the pace on the outside, bid outside of that one into the stretch, then faded the final furlong. GENERAL WINSTON was no factor, widest.

ENTRY.NAME: Grainger County
ENTRY.COMMENT: allwd to settle,svd grnd 2path,came thru, flattnd out

ENTRY.NAME: The Sinner Is You
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pck,svd grnd,came thru, stdy gain, drove clear

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Taylor Brothers Properties LLC,George E. Saufley, & Brian

ENTRY.NAME: General Winston
ENTRY.OWNER: S Matthew Kintz Racing and Sales Inc
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor, widest

ENTRY.NAME: Twirling Mamba
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated cls up,position 2path,fanned 4w str,clsd for plc

ENTRY.NAME: Supremacy
ENTRY.COMMENT: stlkd outside, bid outside, faded final furlong

ENTRY.NAME: Call Me Later
ENTRY.COMMENT: pc inside, stayed on, wknd late, held show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RACE 4 1M All Weather Track CR: 80. Claiming Purse 11000. (PLUS UP TO 30% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2022 - 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE AUGUST 28, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 28 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Claiming Races For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility And Allowances) (Limited To10 Starters).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CEDUNA tracked the pace well back, saved ground through the turns, angled four wide into the stretch, made a steady gain and drove clear late. STUNNING BABY broke a step slowly from the gate and was allowed to settle, angled out through the second turn and fanned widest into the stretch, made a steady gain and closed well for the place. PERCENTAGE rated outside the leader, held position on the two path through the second turn, bid three wide outside that one into the lane and flattened out. INCLUSIVE well placed and outside, moved up three wide through the second turn, bid on that path into the stretch, then closed through traffic to hold a share. GOLD WING mid pack, moved up three and four wide through the second turn, fanned five wide into the stretch and improved position. CLEMSON TIGER mid pack, moved up on the two path through the second turn, fanned five wide into the stretch and had no rally. VALDOLOBO (IRE) sprinted to a clear lead soon after the start, stayed on when challenged into the stretch, then faded late. LAUDERDALE was never involved, inside.

ENTRY.NAME: Valdolobo (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clr, stayed on, faded late

ENTRY.NAME: Gold Wing
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pck,moved up 3& 4w 2nd trn, 5w str, improved position

ENTRY.NAME: Clemson Tiger
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pck,position 2path 2nd, 5w str, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Lauderdale
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Stunning Baby
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk step slw,angled out 2nd trn,widest str, clsd for plc

ENTRY.NAME: Percentage
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated outside,held position 2path 2nd,bid outside 3w,flattnd

ENTRY.NAME: Ceduna
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked back,svd grnd trns,angled 4w str,stdy gain,drove clear

ENTRY.NAME: Inclusive
ENTRY.COMMENT: well plcd outside, moved up 3w 2nd trn, 3w str,clsd thru traffic

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RACE 5 1 1/4M All Weather Track CR: 90. Starter Allowance Purse 21000. (PLUS UP TO 30% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $6,250 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 28 Allowed 2 lbs. (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RUNAWAY HARRY sprinted to a clear lead soon after the start, held sway without challenge, then drew off in the stretch and was kept to the task. COUNTY COURT well placed, saved ground through the turns, angled out to bid outside the leader into the stretch, then could not threaten that one and held the place. SUN DADDY well placed and outside, gained position three wide through the second turn, bid on that path into the lane and had a mild gain. SNAKERATTLEANDROLL rated back early, stalked the pace outside to the second turn, then faded into the stretch. BASSETT was never involved.

ENTRY.COMMENT: rated back,stlkd outside,lost grnd 2nd trn, no rally

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RACE 6 1M All Weather Track CR: 83. Claiming Purse 19000. (PLUS UP TO 30% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 28 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances) (Limited To10 Starters).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KNIGHT LEGEND tracked the pace, saved ground through the turns, angled three wide into the stretch, made a steady gain and edged ahead late. R ADMIRAL sprinted to a clear lead soon after the start, turned back a bid and shook clear into the stretch, then was no match for the winner, while clearly best of the rest. INAPPROPRIATE well placed and outside, gained a striking position on the two path through the second turn, bid outside the leader into the stretch, then could not match strides with that one and held the show. WORLDS ON HIGH allowed to settle, moved up while angling out through the second turn, fanned widest into the stretch, made a steady gain and got up for a share. PREGAME unhurried, moved up two and three wide through the second turn, came four wide into the stretch and improved position. LEGEND OF CHARLIE mid pack,, moved up inside through the second turn, came through inside of rivals into the stretch and had no rally. SUPER GREMLIN mid pack, moved up three wide through the second turn, then faded into the stretch.

ENTRY.OWNER: Bone Robert D and Brown Edward Rusty J
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pck, moved up inside 2nd trn,came thru,no rally

ENTRY.COMMENT: allwd to settle, angled out 2nd trn, widest str,up for share

ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, 2& 3w 2nd trn, 4w str, improved position

ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pc,svd grn trns,angled out,3w str,stdy gain,edged up late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RACE 7 6 1/2F All Weather Track CR: 89. Claiming Purse 20000. (PLUS UP TO 30% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 28 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHAKIN IT UP LARRY sprinted to a clear lead soon after the start, held sway without challenge, then drew off in the stretch and was kept to the task. GINS AND TINS mid pack, moved up two and three wide through the turn, fanned four wide into the stretch and closed well for the place. DANEFIELD well placed and outside, gained position two and three wide through the turn, bid three wide outside the leader into the stretch, then weakened late and held the show. CANADIAN GAME mid pack, looped up three and four wide through the turn, fanned five wide into the stretch and got up for a share. LITTLE BIG tracked the pace, saved ground through the turn, came through inside of rivals into the stretch and faded the final furlong. TONY SMALL showed little, inside. BEAR CREEK was never involved. RIO ABAJO broke out, bobbling and bumping a rival at the start, was pushed in, then bore out badly and was pulled up and was vanned off. A STEWARDS' INQUIRY INTO THE START AND BACKSTRETCH RUN, RESULTED IN NO CHANGE

ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.COMMENT: showed little, inside

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RACE 8 1 1/16M All Weather Track CR: 72. Claiming Purse 13000. (PLUS UP TO 30% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 28 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250 (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less N ot Considered In Estimating Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CONRADO sprinted to a clear lead soon after the start, held sway without challenge, then drew off in the stretch and was kept to the task. NATHANIEL'S HOPE allowed to settle, moved up on the two path through the second turn, came three wide into the stretch, made a steady gain and closed well for the place. MAGIC WIZARD allowed to settle, moved up two and three wide through the second turn, came four wide into the stretch, made a steady gain, angled out late for clear racing room and edged up for the show. ROUND OF APPLAUSE well placed and between, gained position three wide through the second turn, bid on that path into the stretch, then drifted in and flattened out. RAPA NUI well placed inside, saved ground through the turns, came through inside of rivals into the stretch and weakened the final furlong. PITTSBURGH broke in at the start, bumping, tracked the pace through the first turn, stalked that one down the backstretch, held position on the two path through the second turn, came through on that path and weakened the final furlong. DUDEWITHTHEDIAMOND unhurried, moved up on the two path through the second turn, came through on that path into the lane and faded the final furlong. BLUE COSMO mid pack, moved up four wide through the second turn, bid on that path into the lane and had no rally. EL DUQUE was never involved.

ENTRY.NAME: Rapa Nui
ENTRY.COMMENT: well plcd,svd grnd,came thru, wknd final furl

ENTRY.NAME: Conrado
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clr, never challenged,drew off,kept to task

ENTRY.COMMENT: well plcd between,position 3w 2nd trn,3w str,drift in,flattnd out

ENTRY.COMMENT: allwd to settle, 2& 3w 2nd trn, 4w str,angled out late,edged for
